title: Brace for a market unlike anything you’ve ever seen
itunes:title: Brace for a market unlike anything you’ve ever seen
description: This week is all about the Fed.  Daniel joins me once again to discuss yesterday’s interest rate hike, and what stood out about Fed Chair Jerome Powell's comments… Prepare for a couple of rants on why Powell is driving blind… and what we need to see before stocks become cheap. I break down why the U.S. dollar will keep rising… and how this will impact the global economy.  Bottom line, Powell is going to push stocks significantly lower. If you don’t have portfolio protection in place, this strategy is one of the best ways to play defense… and start profiting from a falling market. In this episode [Aim for 5 bullets max]:  Daniel’s reaction to Powell’s Q&A [1:25] Why this market is unlike anything we’ve ever seen [3:25]  A rising U.S dollar will cause a lot of pain [15:55]  Powell is ruining all the bull market catalysts [23:00]  How to protect yourself from a market crash [37:38]  Enjoyed this episode? Get Wall Street Unplugged delivered FREE to your inbox every Wednesday: https://www.curzioresearch.com/wall-street-unplugged/ Wall Street Unplugged podcast is available at: --: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/wall-street-unplugged-frank/ -- : https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/curzio-research/wall-street-unplugged-2 -- : https://www.curzioresearch.com/category/podcast/wall-street-unplugged/   : https://twitter.com/frankcurzio :. https://www.facebook.com/CurzioResearch/ : https://www.linkedin.com/in/frank-curzio-690561a7/ :
